scripts.build: prisma generate && tsc && node scripts/add-js-extensions.js && copyfiles -u 3 "game.server/src/generated/prisma/**/*" game.server/dist/generated
scripts.protoc: protoc --ts_out game.server/src/generated --ts_opt long_type_string --proto_path game.server/src/proto game.server/src/proto/common/enums.proto game.server/src/proto/common/types.proto game.server/src/proto/packet/auth.proto game.server/src/proto/packet/game_actions.proto game.server/src/proto/packet/notifications.proto game.server/src/proto/packet/room_actions.proto game.server/src/proto/gamePacket.proto
